channel.title: Projects on UQ AIS XNAT
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on UQ AIS XNAT

item.title: Granting Access
item.description:
Switch to the Access tab. Use Add User or Add Users from List to select the user to add

Select role from

  1. Owners
  2. Members
  3. Collaborators

User roles

The following table outlines the permissions given to each role.

Permission Owners Members Collaborators
Data - Create ✓ ✓ ✗
Data - Read/Download ✓ ✓ ✓
Data - Update ✓ ✓ ✗
Data - Delete ✓ ✗ ✗
User - Add/Remove ✓ ✗ ✗
User - Change role ✓ ✗ ✗

item.title: Request Storage
item.description:
Note

Default limits on collections are 1TB storage and 1 million files.
If either limit is reached, you may not be able to add or update files.

Use the following steps to request to request an increase in storage size and/or file count limit:

Step 1

Go to rdm.uq.edu.au, login and select your RDM collection

Step 2

Click the Request more storage button (shown below)

Step 3

Fill the form with the relevant details and submit.
